definition: Explaining in words is not as good as teaching by example (idiom). Action speaks louder than words.
pinyin: yan2 jiao4 bu4 ru2 shen1 jiao4

definition: teaching by example beats explaining in words (idiom)/action speaks louder than words
pinyin: shen1 jiao4 sheng4 yu2 yan2 jiao4

sentences.english: They bring home to me the true meaning of "Example is better than precept".
sentences.chinese: 他们使我明白身教重于言教的真义。

sentences.english: We all know that "example is better than precept."
sentences.chinese: 我们都知道，“身教重于言教”。

sentences.english: You taught by example and for that I am grateful.
sentences.chinese: 你以身作则，身教重于言教，对此我非常感激。

sentences.english: The best teachers award goes to you.
sentences.chinese: 因为您的身教言教，颁给您最佳教师奖。

definition: Explaining in words is not as good as teaching by example (idiom). Action speaks louder than words.
pinyin: yan2 jiao4 bu4 ru2 shen1 jiao4

definition: to enlighten/to civilize/to indoctrinate/to train (an animal)
Dharma (the teachings of the Buddha)/Buddhist doctrine
doctrine (esp. religious)/argumentation (in a speech or essay)
Buddhist teacher (Sanskrit transliteration)/also written 阿闍黎|阿阇黎[a1 she2 li2]
(Buddhism) to adhere strictly to the ethical precepts/asceticism
filial piety (Confucian virtue)/to be a good son or daughter
variant of 思維|思维[si1 wei2]
